citation_details.title: Investigating the Triple Code Model in numerical cognition using stereotactic electroencephalography

citation_details.abstract: The ability to conceptualize numerical quantities is an essential human trait. According to  the “Triple Code Model” in numerical cognition, distinct neural substrates encode the
